caseTitle: Umar Aslam Khan v. Election Commission of Pakistan through Chief Election Commissioner, Election House, Islamabad and others
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: Since there is no provision either in the Constitution or in the Elections Act that makes a proclaimed offender disqualified from contesting the election, the courts cannot on their own create such additional disqualification, without any backing of the law.
